docs.text: py_uml_gen_gui Python 🐍 UML diagrams generator GUI Acknowledgements I want to thank plants 🎋 for providing me oxygen each day. Also, I want to thank the sun 🌄 for providing more than half of their nourishment free of charge. Prerequisites Python(>=3.6) GraphViz Installation Create Virtual environment python -m venv venv Activate virtual environment and upgrade pip venv\Scripts\activate pip install pip --upgrade Install py_uml_gen_gui module pip install py_uml_gen_gui Usage Import PyUmlGenGui module # Import PyUmlGenGui module from py_uml_gen_gui import PyUmlGenGui # create PyUmlGenGui object app_obj = PyUmlGenGui() Example use cases # Documentaion Incomplete
